body:
Hi Stefan,


are you sure the weather file you got from the weather station is from 
the same year where your measurement took place ?


What kind of data you got from the weather station? (Direct-normal, 
Direct horiziontal, Diffuse horizontal, Global)?
Do you have an obstruction in the simulation (and in reality)? If yes, 
is it continuous (like a block?) or something with a pattern (like 
stripes or large leaves from a tree)?


Jan
___
